Title: Prism@Metro
Description: Prism@Metro is a quick port of Prism 4.0 for WinRT Metro Style Apps with C# and MetroIoc
HomeWiki:
Update 07/29/2012
I updated prism@metro to be compatible with Win8 RC.

I just migrated Prism form Metro Style Apps with C#. For sure it is no proper migration, but for my purpose it worked quite well.

Here a few information:
  • There are no tests until now, so no garantee that it works!
  • The MetroIoc library is used for dependency injection.
  • I hadn't the time to migrate the week delegate referece, so pay attention that everything works with strong references, even though you configured it to work with week references!
  • I also added a very small example to to compose a simple Metro App, everything else should work like in Prism 4.0.

Feel free to contribute to the Project with your source code :)
